ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T19:35:08 [Issue ID 4000-100361] urn:comicvine:4000-100361 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 14:10:50. [Issue ID 221781]
ComicInfo.Summary: Fastbender continues telling Hertz his theory of Ghengis Kahn, while the chat rooms are again busy with talk of Hellspawn. Meanwhile, a deranged jilted lover kidnaps and holds as hostage a woman he imagines to be a local newswoman, but is in fact his ex-lover. He thinks he has performed this heroic act to show his ex-lover that he is not afraid and will do anything for her. Spawn appears and forces the kidnapper to see what he has done, and threatens to return if ammends aren't made. Spawn's efforts are applauded by three heavily armed angels, who are really there for a whole other purpose.
ComicInfo.Title: Selling Fear
